comments.content:
The closest I came (matching roughly the "a" and "t" but not the "p" and "s") is Sentinal Bold Italic:

[www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/sentinel/bold-italic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725053837/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/sentinel/bold-italic/ "www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/sentinel/bold-italic/")

I suspect the original was hand-drawn.
